projects.title: Viking Face
decription: This website is my last project. You are navigating here so you has saw what is it. To show and offer my skills to the public I thought that was a good idea create a CLEAN project with my favorite framwork for web <b>Angular X<b>.

I put the X because Angular are updating always, when I started the current version was 6.0, but I try to update to the last version always because their are offer a great improvements in each version.
This repo is public so you can check it on Github, in my account @NSViking,
And for more collaboration to the community I'm creating a great tutorial in medium with all steps to do it. You can enjoy it ASAP.

projects.title: Moni
decription: My last iOS App is this. At my current job we have some perks and one of this is the Restaurant Pass, but is it with La Caixa, a bank of Spain, they have a service that call <b>Money To Pay<b/>.
They have a website to check you movements and balance, but is so tricky because you need add the card every time you want access.
So this is my approach, I manage the credit cards to save the numbers and only with one click you can redirect to the necessary website and only enter the security code and check.

Yes, I'm doing trampas but I tried to check the endpoints to attack directy and improve the mobile experience but they have closed this service, un aplauso! The security is very important and this guys knows.

projects.title: TriviSeries
decription: Waw! My favorite. This is my love, my first great game. With multiplayer about one of the things I'm in love (TVSeries). I started this project 3 years ago more or less. And I needed to do the backend services when I didn't know nothing about it, so I decided do with PHP but alone without frameworks.

I did one of my firsts iOS apps for it. So I can improve the code every week because I learnt more things or because I discovered more utils. Obiously all the design is not mine. I was the head for that but I count with a friend to draw it, are some simple things but others like the pieces was awesome.
My favorite thing about it was the implementation for the ways when you use the dado. Because I implemented a GRAPH to show the differents options to the user. Awesome solution.
I earned around 500$ with this game, but some things, other jobs and my free time stopped it and I love to return some day.

projects.title: CRLaserTag
decription: CR the best player ever XD. I love the Real Madrid and CR was a great player for us. But when he started at the Real Madrid I was starting to discover this world so ... One friend told me about the idea to do a game to touch a CR with a laser ... At this moment I thought that it could be funny. But I didn't know the work that it was required.

Around 6 months or more I was checking, learning and developing with the library Cocos2d for iOS, I drew, scan and redraw with Illustration the differents positions to CR movements and connected with the physics of iOS project.

I developed 3 differents mode of games: Touch a CR while he try to goal, save CR while the people at the stadium get out some things to his and do Combos while a lot of CR's appears at the screen, with Combos and failings depends of you appunt.

It was very hard but very funny, I learned how do games at it was awesome. This game takes more than 60K downloads at the AppStore, but it was free I earned with Ads and it not was much, around 400$, some years after Apple come to me and remove my App because CR image.
